name: Natural Yogurt Bath Bar
description:
Natural Yogurt Bar Soap with an all natural base, no SLS, no added detergents, no animal testing, only the finest natural ingredients. With or without fragrance and/or botanicals. 


Available in a variety of fragrances.

Lavender, Fresh Citrus, Cranberry, Sandalwood, Almond, Pineapple, Black for Men, Sunflower, Energy, Relaxation, Bamboo & White Grapefruit, Tahitian Waters, Black Linen & Amber, and Honey Caramel to name a few. Hundreds of fragrances available.

name: All Natural Bath Oil 8oz.
description:
Fragranced oil for your bath and body. Made with all natural oils and non-irritating fragrances.


Available in a variety of fragrances.

Lavender, Fresh Citrus, Cranberry, Sandalwood, Almond, Pineapple, Black for Men, Sunflower, Energy, Relaxation, Bamboo & White Grapefruit, Tahitian Waters, Black Linen & Amber, and Honey Caramel to name a few. Hundreds of fragrances available.

name: Natural Cocoa Butter Bath Bar
description:
Bar Soap with an all natural base, no SLS, no added detergents, no animal testing, only the finest natural ingredients cocoa butter base. Rich and creamy lather. Available with or without fragrance.

Available in a variety of fragrances.

Lavender, Fresh Citrus, Cranberry, Sandalwood, Almond, Pineapple, Black for Men, Sunflower, Energy, Relaxation, Bamboo & White Grapefruit, Tahitian Waters, Black Linen & Amber, and Honey Caramel to name a few. Hundreds of fragrances available.
